api sitting on top of Entity Framework and SQL Server This service is not a shared implementation used across the entire product line and runs with minimal maintenance Was a key player in leading the charge as we migrated our legacy applications to our new go forward platform Able to easily adapt to new technologies and move between various software products with ease Sole developer rearchitecting
